content:
also available at free-crochet com 1 1 https //www free-crochet com/crochet_accessories/crochet_gift_patterns/tv_jake/ **description ** you ll always know just where to find your remote control with jake the guard kitty around not to mention he s a fun companion while you watch your favorite shows
**yarn requirements ** worsted weight yarn * 5-1/2 oz med brown * small amount lt brown * small amount dk brown **other materials ** * size h crochet hook * 2/3 yard of 1-3/8 inch wide calico print craft ribbon * 2 green 15mm cat eyes with washers * 1/2 inch pink pom-pom * 3 inch square piece of cardboard * polyester fiberfill * craft glue or hot glue gun * tapestry needle
